name: iPGNViewer
description:
iPGNViewer is a IOS application which allows to view PGN format chess games and visualizes moves from its notation.
Use iTunes's File Sharing to add PGN files to open pin files in iPGNViewer.
iPGNViewer also includes a lot of local PGN format games for you to view.

Features
1) Multiple games per PGN file.
2) Displaying PGN Game Contents.
3) Visualizing Chess Moves From Notation.
